title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections         Final clean up historic photo  Search through various databases to find genealogical information, photographs, newspaper clippings, other resource information.  Â        This proposed design for a city seal illustrated the spirit of determination that characterized Seattle in 1897 Museum of History and Industry, Seattle  For in-depth information about Seattle during and after the Klondike Gold Rush view the online version of Hard Drive to the Klondike: Promoting Seattle During the Gold Rush. This out-of-print publication was prepared for the National Park Service as a historic resource study for the Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park in November 1998.
